titlepage.titleproper: Register of the Rusztem Vambéry Papers, 1887-1948
titlepage.publisher:
Hoover Institution Archives
Stanford University
Stanford, California
titlepage.p: © 1999 Hoover Institution Archives. All rights reserved.

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Rusztem Vambéry Papers,
did.abstract: Correspondence, speeches and writings, reports, and printed matter, relating to criminology, Hungarian domestic and foreign affairs, Hungarian- American relations, and Hungarian emigres in the U.S.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research

The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Rusztem Vambéry Papers, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1975.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

chronitem.event: Admitted to the Bar of Budapest
Judge to the Court of Appeals and attached to the Department of Bill Drafting at the Ministry of Justice
Reader in criminal law, Law School at the University of Budapest
Professor of Law, Law School at the University of Budapest
Vice Chairman of the liberal Kossuth Party
Member of the National Council during th October Revolution
Practiced law (defended Mátyás Rákosi and other political prisoners of the left, lectured in Hungary, Czechoslovakia and England)
Founder and editor in chief of Századunk (Our Century, a journal of sociology)
Immigrated to the United States of America
Professor at the New School of Social Research, in New York
President of Committee for New Democratic Hungary
Special Advisor to the U.S. Office of Strategic Services (OSS) and the British Information Service on Hungarian matters
Envoy Extraordinary and Minister Plenipotentiary to the United States (appointed September 6, 1946 and resigned May 19, 1948)

did.unittitle: Biographical File, 1897-1948.

scopecontent.p: Personal documents, doctor's diploma, biographical data, personal data sheets, recommendations, and newspaper clippings, arranged chronologically.

did.unittitle: Correspondence, 1890-1948

scopecontent.p: Arranged alphabetically by name of correspondent.

Speeches and Writings, 1890-1948

scopecontent.p: Handwritten and typewritten writings, lectures, speeches, book reviews, and letters to editors, arranged by type of document and thereunder alphabetically by either subject or title.

Titled writings
Agrarian problem in Southeastern Europe, extracts from a lecture given at the Philadelphia Ethical Society, typewritten, 1944.
Akiket nem érdekel sem Ady sem Ignotus (Those, who are not interested either in Ady, or Ingnotus), draft, in Hungarian, typewritten, n.d.
And after Horthy what? a draft of an article for the newspaper Harc (Fight), n.d.
Angol boertoen reform (British prison reform), published article, Az Est (Evening), July 11, 1923, in Hungarian.
Angol buentetoejog (British criminal law), draft, in Hungarian, handwritten.
Angol koezvélemény és a halálbuentetés (British public opinion and the capital punishment), published article, Világ (World), January 20, 1923, in Hungarian.
Vambéry Rusztem az angol választások mérlegéroel (Rusztem Vambéry, about the election results of England), published article, Világ (World), November 15, 1924, in Hungarian.
Apai oeroekségem; Deák Ferenc (Paternal heritage; Francis Deák), published article, Magyar Forum (Hungarian Forum), July 1943, in Hungarian.
Ártatlan vér kiáltása (Scream of the innocent blood), published article, Népszava (People's Voice), August 28, 1927, in Hungarian.
Ausnahmsrecht - Ausnahmsgewalt (Exceptional right - exceptional authority), published article, Volksstimme (People's Voice), May 19, 1923, in German.
Aussenpolitik der Labour Party (Foreign policy of the Labour Party), published article, Pester Lloyd (Lloyd of Pest), January 3, 1924, in German.
Balkezes jobboldal (Lefthanded Rightwing), published article, Népszava (People's Voice), December 25, 1936, in Hungarian.
Béke útja (Way of peace), published article, Kortárs (Contemporary), November 20, 1929, in Hungarian.
Benes és a halálbuentetés (Benes and the capital punishment), published article, Reggel (Morning), n.d., in Hungarian.
Boertoenuegy toerténete (Prison history), unpublished, n.d., in Hungarian, handwritten.
Boertoenuegyi koerut Észak-Amerikában (Prison system study trip in North-America), published article, Budapesti Hirlap (Budapest News), October 20, 1910, in Hungarian.
Buentetoenovella, I-IV. (Penal code revision), published article, Népszava (People's Voice), May 23, 27, 28, and June 5, 1924, in Hungarian.
Buentetoejog, II. (Criminal law, II.), published article, Budapest, Grill Károly, 1918, 189 p., in Hungarian.
Buentetoejogi visszaesés szabályozása tárgyában; vélemény és tervezet (Repeating in criminal law; opinion and draft), published article, n.d. in Hungarian.
Cena jedinecneho characteru (Standard price characteristics), published article, Lidove Noviny (People's News), September 13, 1937, in Czech.
Cenzura (Censurship), published article, Világ (World), October 13, 1918, in Hungarian.
Cimbitorlás (Title abuse), published article, Népszava (People's Voice), December 25, 1935, in Hungarian.
Crime, the criminal and society, unpublished, course draft, n.d., handwritten.
Criminals and war criminals, published article, Nation, n.d..
Criminology and behaviorism, published article, The Journal of criminal law and criminology, July-August, 1941, printed copy and original handwritten manuscript.
Csak becsueletes amnesztia segíthet! A béke paragrafus a buentetoe novellában, published article, Népszava (People's Voice), June 8, 1924, in Hungarian.
Danubian peace, published article, Central European Affairs, April 1, 1943.
Dat Galenus opes? published article, Orvosi Napló (Medical Diary), October 25, 1934, in Hungarian.

Demokrácia válsága (The crisis in democracy), published article, Kassai Napló (Kassa Diary), n.d., in Hungarian. Clipping. Also in Bácsmegyei Napló (Bács county diary), November 25, 1923, in Hungarian.
Demokrácia úgynevezett válsága (The so-called crisis of democracy), published article, in Hungarian, n.d.
Dilettáns toerveny faragás (Diletant law making), published article, Kereskedoe Joga (Right of the Merchant), October 15, 1921, in Hungarian.
Éles politika és csorba buentetés (Sharp politics and dull punishment), published article, Népszava (People's Voice), June 21, 1925, in Hungarian.
Elfogultság (Bias), unpublished, n.d., in Hungarian, typewritten.
Elméleti és gyakorlati hazafisag (Theoretical and practical patriotism), published article, Népszava (People's Voice), January 27, 1932, in Hungarian.
Oe gyuemoelcseikroel esmeritek meg oeket (You recognize them from their fruits), published, article, Esti Kurir (Evening Courier), December 16, 1923, in Hungarian.
Englische Finanzen (English finances), published article, Pester Lloyd (Lloyd of Pest), August 7, 1923, in German.
Enigme hongroise? (Hungarian enigme), published, article, France Amerique (French American), April 16, 1944, in French.
Erkoelcs válsága (Crisis of morale), published article, Est(Evening), August 9, 1923, in Hungarian.
Eskuedtszék a másvilágon (Jury in the world beyond), published article, Népszava (People's Voice), December 25, 1925, in Hungarian, Clipping.
Europaeische Rivalitaet in Persien und die deutsche Bagdadbahn (European rivalries in Persien and the German Bagdad railroad), published article, Deutsche Rundschau (German review), May 1900.
Extradition treaties, Budapest, Atheneum, 1908,
Fachbildung der Gefaengnisbeamten (Training of prison officials), published article, Oesterreichische Zeitschrift fuer Strafrecht, (Austrain Journal for penal law), 1911, in German.
Failure of a mission and mission of a failure, unpublished, n.d., typewritten.
Fayer László (László Fayer), published article, Világ (World), December 2, 1922, in Hungarian.
Fél-igazságok (Half-truth), published article, Népszava (People's Voice), June 4, 1933, in Hungarian.

Feleloeségre kell vonni azokat is, akik a szellemi ekrazitot gyártják (Those too shall be held responsible, who manufacture the intellectual expolsives), published article, Esti Kurir (Evening Courier), January 9, 1924, in Hungarian.

Fiatalkoruak buenvádi eljárására vonatkozó kuelfoeldi toervények, toervényjavaslatok és vélemények (Foreign laws, bills and opinions relative to the criminal procedure of juvenile deliquents), published article, Budapest, Franklin, 1911.
Foeltámadás (Resurrection), published article, Népszava (People's Voice), April 5, 1935, in Hungarian.
`Free Hungary' Movement in the U.S.; new group against Horthy Regime LIberation from Nazism not enough, published article, Voice of Freedom, December 1941?, in Hungarian.
Freihandelskonferenz (Free Trade Conference), published article, Pester Lloyd (Lloyd of Pest), October 16, 1922, in German.
Fruits of the Berlin-Budapest marriage, published article, source unknown, n.d.
Gazdasági demokrácia (Economic democracy), published article, Gyoeri Lloyd (Lloyd of Gyoer), May 23, 1926, in Hungarian.
Genocide, unpublished, draft, n.d., typewritten.
Gondolat bilincsei (Chains of thought), published article, source unknown, in Hungarian.
Háboru a jog és az igazság ellen (War against the law and the truth), published article, Világ (World), June 22, 1924, in Hungarian.
Háboru és jog, (War and law), Budapest, Franklin, 1933, in Hungarian. Printed copy. Also included in the folder: Háboru és jog (War and law), published, Jogi Napló, May 25, 1933, in Hungarian.
Hadifogság (War captivity), published article, Világ (World), December 25, 1914, in Hungarian.
Halálbuentetés (Capital punishment), published article, Népszava (People's Voice), February 26, 1928, in Hungarian.
Harmadik egyetem (The third university) published article, Szeged és vidéke (Szeged and it's region), December 25, 1906, in Hungarian.
Heidelbergi kongresszus (Congress of Heidelberg), published article, source unknown, n.d., in Hungarian.
Horogkeresztre feszitett jog (Law, crucified upon the swastika), published article, Ujság (News), June 7, 1934, in Hungarian.
How to fight antisemitism, unpublished, draft, n.d., typewritten.
Hungarian problem, New York, 1942, 47 p., published pamphlet. Also included in the folder, book reviews in German and Hungarian.
Igazi turánizmus diadal (Triumph of genuine Turanism), published article, Esti Kurir (Evening Courier), July 4, 1924, in Hungarian.
Igy is lehet Istent szolgálni, (This way too can God be served), published article Népszava (People's Voice), June 25, 1926, in Hungarian.
Is liberalism doomed? unpublished, n.d., handwritten.
Dr. Isidor Baumgarten, published article, Pester Lloyd (Lloyd of Pest), October 1, 1914, in German.
Jó ember és a rossz ember (Good man and bad man), published article, Népszava (People's Voice), February 22, 1931, in Hungarian.
Joevoe boertoenrendszere (Future prisonsystem), Budapest, Pallas, 1914. Published pamphlet, in Hungarian.
Jog, forrandalom és népbiróság (Law, revolution and people's court), published article, Bérmunkas naptár (Wage Laborer Calendar), 1947, in Hungarian.
Jókai politikai csillaga (Jókai's political star), published speech, Világ (World), February 22, 1925, in Hungarian.
Jubilálunk (Celebrating our jubilee), published article, Ember (The Man), n.d., in Hungarian.
Kereskedelem és kriminalitás (Commerce and delinquency), published article, unknown, n.d., in Hungarian.
Kereskedoe becsuelete (Merchant's honor), published article, source unknown, n.d., in Hungarian.
Kereszt (Cross), published article, Világ (World), April 12, 1925, in Hungarian.
Két emigrácio (Two emigrations), published article, Tárogató (Clarinet), October 1940, in Hungarian.
Koez- és jogrend (Public- and legal order), published article, Népszava (People's Voice), July 19, 1936, in Hungarian.
Komor esperes (Stern churchman), published, Népszava (People's Voice), November 13, 1927, in Hungarian.
Konstantinápolyi benyomások (Impressions about Constantinople), published article, Ujság (News), November 12, 1916, in Hugarian.
Kostgeldwucher (Costusury), published article, Pester Lloyd (Lloyd of Pest), March 6, 1923, in German.

A kriminalistanak nincs oka arra, hogy az utolsó tíz év eredményeire túl bueszke legyen... (The criminalist has no reason to be too proud of the last ten years' achievements), published article, Esti Kurir (Evening Courier), December 25, 1923, in Hungarian.
Kriminalpszichologia (Criminalpsychology), published article, Világ (World), December 25, 1913, in Hungarian.
Kriminologia (Criminology), published article, source unknown, n.d., in Hungarian.
Kukák (Dumbs), published article, Népszava (People's Voice), December 25, 1931, in Hungarian.
Kultúra és igazság (Culture and truth), published article, Uj fény (New light), October 1941, in Hungarian.
Labour Party választási kuezdelme (Labour Party's election campaign), published article, Világ (World), October 29, 1924, in Hungarian.
Law and legalism, published article, Nation, December 1, 1945.
Law of the tribunal, published article Nation, October 12, 1946.
`Legesleghatályosabb' ( `Strongest' ), published article Népszava (People's Voice), January 15, 1928, in Hungarian.
Levéltitok megsértés? (Letter intercepting?), published article, Posta (Mail), June 15, 1916, in Hungarian.
`Libro e moschetto...' ( `Book and musket' ), source unknown, n.d., in Hungarian.
Lombroso, published article, source unknown, n.d., in Hungarian.
Madarsko a Ceskoslovensko; staci jen styky hospodarske? (Hungary and Czecholovakia; stops and economic contacts), published article, Democraticki stred (Democratic step)?, 1937, in Czech.
Magyar gyermekvédelem, (Hungarian child care), published article, source unknown, n.d., in Hungarian.
Magyarország, Európa és a trianoni béke reviziója (Hungary, Europe and the revision of the Treaty of Trianon), published article, Pesti Naplo (Diary of Pest), December 20, 1927, in Hungarian.

Magyarország hat esztendoe eloett kinai fallal vette magát koeruel (Hungary encircled herself by a Chinese wall, six years ago), published article, Esti Kurie (Evening Courier), December 25, 1924, in Hungarian.
Magyarság feltámadasa (Resurrection of Hungarians), published article, Népszava (People's Voice), March 27, 1932, in Hungarian.
Memo on Hungarian democracy, unpublished, n.d., typewritten.
Memorandum on Hungary, unpublished, n.d., typewritten.
Memorandum on the prerequisites of a Danubian and/or a Balkan Federation, unpublished, n.d., typewritten.
Mit tett az angol munkáskormány? (What did the British Labour Government do?), published article, Világ (World), August 24, 1924, in Hungarian.
Das Mitteleuropa der Juristen (The Central-Europe of jurists), published article, Berliner Tagblatt (Berlin Daily), April 7, 1916, in German.
Mors juris imperator, published article, Pesti Napló (Diary of Pest), December 25, 1913, in Hungarian.
Mult és joevoe (Past and future), published article, Egyetemi lapok (University Bulletin), February 20, 1919, in Hungarain.
Nádosy és - Kossuth (Nádosy and - Kossuth), published article, Népszava (People's Voice), August 22, 1926, in Hungarian.
Nagy Emil jobbágyai (Cerfs of Emil Nagy), published article, Esti Kurir (Evening Courier), January 20, 1924, in Hungarian.
Ne védjétek meg a nemzetet - a nemzet ellen (Don't save the nation - from the nation), published, Népszava (People's Voice), December 25, 1936, in Hungarian.
Negyven év és huszonnégy óra (Forty years and twenty-four hours), published speech, Világ (World), November 2, 1923, in Hungarian.

Német Btk. reviziója; I. Alapelv és buentetési rendszer (Revision of the German Penal Code; I. Principles and penal system), published pamphlet, Budapest, Franklin, 1903. 91 p., in Hungarian, printed copy.
Német demokrácia és a magyar Papenek (German democracy and Hungarian Papens), published article, Népszava (People's Voice), August 7, 1932, in Hungarian.
Nemi ragályozas veszélyének buentethetoesége (Punishability of the possible danger arisen from inflicting veneral diseases), published speech, 1917, in Hungarian.
Népszoevetség, vagy a Népek Szoevetsége (Nation League or the League of Nations), published article, Népszava (People's Voice), May 1, 1936, in Hungarian.
Népszoevetség koezgyuelése után (After the Session of the League of Nations), published article, Szocializmus (Socialism), November 1922, in Hungarian.

Neueste Strafrechtsliterature in Ungarn (Most recent criminal law literature in Hungary), published article, Mitteilungen der Internationalen kriminalistischen Vereinigung, Berlin, J. Guttentag, n.d., in German.
New York 1910-1940, published article, Ember (Man), April 29, 1939, in Hungarian.
Notes for foreign policy Association speech, unpublished, n.d., typewritten.
Nureremberg law, unpublished, n.d., typewritten.
Numerus clausus ország (Land of numerus clausus), published article, Népszava (People's Voice), November 20, 1927, in Hungarian.
Óda a hatalomhoz (Ode to the might), published article, Népszava (People's Voice), December 22, 1922, in Hungarian.
Oengyilkosság a buentetoejogban (Suicide in criminal law), published article, unknown, n.d., in Hungarian.
Oereg emigránsok és fiatal Sarlósok (Old emigrants and young sickle carriers), published article Reggel (Morning), n.d. in Hungarian.
Oeroek erkoelcs (Eternal ethics), published article, Reggel (Morning), n.d., in Hungarian.
Oesterreich und Ungarn (Austria and Hungary), source unknown, n.d., in German.
Of peace and sovereignty, published article, Nation, September 10, 1946, galley proof.
Oktober 31 (October 31) published article, Ember (Man), November 4, 1939, in Hungarian.
Oktober, a szoekevény, (October, the refugee), published article, Nepszava (People's Voice), February 12, 1928, in Hungarian.
Orvosi titok (és a magzatelhajtás) (Medical secret (and abortus)), published article, Gyógyászat (Healing), n.d., in Hungarian.
Outline of a pamphlet on Central and Eastern Europe, unpublished, n.d., typewritten.
Panamarol (About corruption) , published speech, Budapest, Magyar Cobden Szoevetség, January 27, 1922, in Hungarian.
Párbaj (Duel), published article, Jogtudományi Koezloeny (Law Gazette), n.d., in Hungarian.
Párbaj mint kultúrintézmény (Duel as cultural institution), source unknown, n.d., in Hungarian.
Pazifistische Vorschlaege einer Kriminologen (Pacifistic suggestions of a criminologist), published article, Wahrheit (Truth), September 1922, in German.
Peace, is it possible? Unpublished, n.d., handwritten.
Pénzbuentetés mint mellékbuentetés (Fine as added penalty), published article, special issue, Jogtudomanyi Koezloeny (Law Gazette), 1905, in Hungarian.
Philosemitic Nazis and antisemitic Jews; What is happening in Hungary, unpublished, n.d., handwritten.
Politikai erkoelcs (Political ethic), published, article, Népszava (People's Voice), December 25, 1930, in Hungarian.
Problems of Central Europe, unpublished, n.d., handwritten and partly typewritten.
Radikalizmus. karácsonyi párbaj, vívja: Vambéry Rusztem (Radicalism. Christmas duel, fought by Rusztem Vambéry), published article, Népszava (People's Voice), n.d., in Hungarian.
Rakoczi, unpublished, n.d. in Hungarian, typewritten.

Regierungsplaene zur Schaffung vin Freiheits-Legionen; drei Nationen - eine Meinung (Government plans to establish Freedom Legions: three nations - same meaning), published article, Aufbau (Reconstruction), March 13, 1942, in German.
Rendes és rendkivueli (Ordinary and extraordinary), published article, Világ (World), June 22, 1924, in Hungarian.
Rendjavaslat jogboelcselete (Jurisprudence of order proposal), published, Világ (World), December 19, 1922, in Hungarian.
Roevid kitanitas a hazafiságról és a pacifizmusról (Short lecture on patriotism and pacifism), published article, Népszava (People's Voice), January 6, 1923, in Hungarian.
